info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 14 at 4:51PM EDT until May 14 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM EDT FOR SOUTHAMPTON COUNTY AND THE CITY OF FRANKLIN... At 451 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Courtland, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. This severe storm will be near... Courtland around 455 PM EDT. Franklin and Sedley around 510 PM EDT. Hunterdale around 515 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Vicksville, Dory, Sunbeam, Handsom, Berlin, Riverdale, Sebrell, Manry, Shiloh and Story. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
